item.title: 飞利浦第二大投资者在呼吸暂停交易后增持股份
item.description: 在荷兰飞利浦公司解决了与睡眠呼吸机故障有关的索赔两个月后，第二家主要的荷兰皇家飞利浦公司投资者提高了对这家医疗技术巨头的持股比例。【原文：A second major Royal Philips NV investor raised its holding in the medical technology giant, two months after the Dutch firm settled claims linked to its faulty sleep apnea machines.】

item.title: 汉莎航空 3.25 亿欧元 ITA 航空交易获欧盟批准
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）对意大利 ITA 航空公司（ITA Airways）的 3.25 亿欧元（3.5 亿美元）投资获得了欧盟的批准，这使得意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）可以卸下这家航空公司的责任，因为这家航空公司的前身几十年来一直在消耗国家资源。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG’s €325 million ($350 million) investment in Italy’s ITA Airways won approval from the European Union, allowing Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni to offload responsibility for an airline whose predecessor was a drain on state resources for decades.】

item.title: 天气助力收获，俄罗斯小麦价格低于竞争对手
item.description: 俄罗斯小麦价格再次低于其他产地，原因是当地炎热的天气加快了收割速度，贸易商与竞争对手的出口商展开了竞争。【原文：Russian wheat prices have dipped below other origins again, as hot weather speeds up harvest there and traders compete with rival exporters.】

item.title: Wizz 总裁凯里离职，为三项晋升让路
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）总裁罗伯特-凯里（Robert Carey）已经离职，为这家匈牙利廉价航空公司的三名高管晋升铺平了道路。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc President Robert Carey has departed the airline, paving the way for promotions of three executives across the Hungarian budget carrier.】

item.title: 世界银行向赞比亚提供 2 亿美元用于抗旱
item.description: 赞比亚财政部发表声明称，世界银行已批准向赞比亚再拨款 2 亿美元，以帮助该国应对数十年来最严重的旱灾。【原文：The World Bank has approved a further $200 million of grants for Zambia to help the nation cope with its worst drought in decades, according to a statement from the Finance Ministry.】

item.title: 估计显示，法国左翼计划的成本是马克龙计划的六倍
item.description: 根据新的估算，参加法国立法选举的各政党在竞选时做出的承诺在成本上有很大差异，其中左翼联盟的成本最高，主要是因为它计划降低退休年龄。【原文：The parties contesting the French legislative election have made campaign promises that would vary radically in cost, according to new estimates, with the left-wing alliance’s coming in highest largely on its plan to cut the retirement age.】

item.title: 据说 Glencore 将在出价未果后撤回 Kazzinc 出售计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由于潜在买家的估值无法与其匹配，Glencore Plc 放弃了出售其在哈萨克斯坦矿业公司 Kazzinc 股份的计划。【原文：Glencore Plc has abandoned plans to sell its stake in Kazakh mining company Kazzinc after potential buyers failed to match its valuation, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 中国万科挂钩理财公司产品错过兑付期限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国一家网络融资公司未能向购买了部分由与中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：A Chinese online financing company has failed to pay investors who bought equity-backed products partially underpinned by projects linked to China Vanke Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国对瑞士信贷处以创纪录的卖空罚款
item.description: 韩国对瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的两家附属公司处以创纪录的 272 亿韩元（1950 万美元）卖空罚款，因为韩国试图取缔其认为有损市场公平的非法交易。【原文：South Korea imposed a record 27.2 billion won ($19.5 million) short-selling fine across two Credit Suisse affiliates, as the nation attempts to stamp out illegal trading which it sees as hurting fairness in the market.】

item.title: 据报道 Grifols 股东斯克兰顿将寻求 Oaktree 贷款
item.description: 据《El Confidencial》报道，西班牙制药公司 Grifols SA 的大股东斯克兰顿企业正在与橡树资本管理公司商谈 1.3 亿欧元（1.4 亿美元）的信贷额度。【原文：Scranton Enterprises, a major shareholder of Spanish pharmaceutical company Grifols SA, is in talks with Oaktree Capital Management for a €130 million ($140 million) credit line, according to a report by El Confidencial.】

item.title: 瑞典 SBB 债务互换后被 S&P 选择性违约
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将陷入困境的瑞典房东SBB下调为选择性违约，因为该房地产公司以大幅折扣价将其债券换成了新证券。【原文：S&P Global Ratings cut troubled Swedish landlord SBB to selective default after the real estate company initiated an exchange of its bonds for new securities at a deep discount.】

item.title: 台湾反对党首次使用新权力调查政府
item.description: 台湾反对党议员首次使用一项有争议的新法律来反对执政党民进党政府，使一场激烈的政治斗争升级，这可能会阻碍赖清德总统上任仅几周后的议程。【原文：Taiwan’s opposition lawmakers used a contentious new law for the first time against the government of the ruling Democratic Progressive Party, escalating a bitter political fight that could hobble President Lai Ching-te’s agenda just weeks after he took office.】

item.title: 日本 2024 年薪资交易增长 5.1%，创 33 年之最
item.description: 根据日本最大工会组织的最终统计，日本年度薪酬谈判以三十多年来最高的加薪幅度结束，这证实了中央银行所寻求的工资上涨趋势。【原文：Japan’s annual pay negotiations ended with the highest raises in more than three decades, according to the final tally of the country’s biggest union group, confirming an upward trend in wages sought by the central bank.】

item.title: 荷兰合作银行的 Foley 说，法国的僵局不应令市场感到宽慰
item.description: 荷兰合作银行货币策略师简-福利（Jane Foley）认为，周日法国大选后出现悬峙议会的前景不应该让投资者感到高兴，因为这将意味着预算僵局。【原文：The prospect of a hung parliament after France’s election on Sunday shouldn’t cheer investors given that it would mean budget gridlock, according to Rabobank currency strategist Jane Foley.】

item.title: 菲律宾费率制定小组成员离职后出现两个空缺
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）接受两名董事会成员辞职后，菲律宾中央银行的利率制定机构出现了两个空缺。【原文：The Philippine central bank’s rate-setting body has two vacancies after President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. accepted the resignations of two board members.】

item.title: 澳大利亚企业监察机构面临参议院要求解散的呼声
item.description: 澳大利亚的企业监督机构应一分为二，举报人应获得补偿，这是旨在提高其执法能力的改革的一部分。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog should be split in two and whistleblowers should receive compensation as part of reforms aimed at boosting its enforcement capabilities.】

item.title: 勒庞寻求获得多数席位，敌对组织联合起来阻止她
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞领导的国民自卫军（National Rally）在周日举行的法国立法选举最后一轮中争夺绝对多数席位，而对手党派则在竭力阻止极右翼政党下台。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s National Rally is scrambling to get an absolute majority in the final round of France’s legislative election Sunday as rival parties are maneuvering to keep the far-right party out of power.】

item.title: 对冲基金在法国大选动荡中抛售欧洲股票
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds dumped European stocks in June, reversing the buying trend seen in the previous month, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage desk.】

item.title: 日本税收在日元疲软和通货膨胀的影响下再创新高
item.description: 在截至 3 月的财政年度中，日本的税收收入再创新高，这一积极成果的部分原因是日元疲软和通胀疲软。【原文：Japan’s tax revenues reached another record in the fiscal year ended in March, a positive outcome partly driven by the weak yen and sticky inflation.】

item.title: 挪威海产品出口因三文鱼养殖场问题创历史最大跌幅
item.description: 由于三文鱼养殖场的问题拖累了世界上最大的养殖鱼类生产国挪威的收成，挪威上个月的海产品出口创下了历史新低。【原文：Norway’s seafood exports slumped by a record last month as problems at salmon farms dragged down the harvest in the world’s biggest producer of the farmed fish.】

item.title: 世界银行下调泰国经济增长预期，支持央行维持利率稳定
item.description: 世界银行下调了对泰国经济增长的预测，理由是政府 135 亿美元的经济刺激计划存在不确定性，但支持中央银行保持政策利率稳定的立场。【原文：The World Bank trimmed its growth forecast for Thailand, citing uncertainties over the government’s $13.5 billion stimulus plan, but backed the central bank’s stance in keeping the policy rate steady.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：大选前最后一个交易日股市将上涨
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 贝恩印度贷款公司计划在上市前将投资组合扩大一倍
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）从阿达尼集团（Adani Group）手中收购的印度影子贷款公司 Tyger Capital Pvt Ltd. 正准备在下一财年在印度证券交易所上市，并寻求将其贷款组合翻一番。【原文：Tyger Capital Pvt Ltd., the Indian shadow lender Bain Capital bought from the Adani Group, is seeking to double its loan portfolio as it prepares to list on India’s stock exchanges in the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将向中国申请 50 亿美元贷款以促进经济发展
item.description: 孟加拉国央行行长表示，孟加拉国正在与中国商谈约 50 亿美元的贷款事宜，以增加该国日益减少的外汇储备，从而拉近这个南亚国家与北京的距离。【原文：Bangladesh is in talks with China for a loan of about $5 billion to bolster the nation’s dwindling foreign-exchange reserves, the central bank governor said, drawing the South Asian country closer to Beijing.】

item.title: Edelweiss 警告：印度长债交易已变得拥挤不堪
item.description: 一位印度债券基金经理说，印度 30 年期债券的涨势已经过头，因为交易员们夸大了对政策性降息和外国基金增加购买的预期。【原文：An Indian bond fund manager says a rally in the nation’s 30-year bonds has gone too far, as traders hyped up expectations for policy rate cuts and increased purchases by foreign funds.】

item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金 AustralianSuper 正在将资金转向股票，因为预计人工智能将推动科技股进一步上涨。【原文：AustralianSuper, the country’s largest pension fund, is shifting money into equities on the expectation that artificial intelligence will fuel further gains in tech stocks.】

item.title: 星展银行和华侨银行创纪录，新加坡股市跃升至两年新高
item.description: 新加坡股市升至两年来的最高水平，主要银行派发股息的乐观情绪和美联储加息预期的升温都起到了助推作用。【原文：Singapore stocks rose to the highest level in two years, helped by optimism over major banks’ dividend payouts and elevated Federal Reserve interest rates hopes.】

item.title: 美国住房可负担性降至 2007 年以来最低点
item.description: 对于美国的普通收入者来说，拥有一套住房的负担能力比 17 年来任何时候都要低。【原文：Owning a house is less affordable for average earners in the US than at anytime in 17 years.】
